Job Title: Head of Sales

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Exelegent is a professional services company that specializes in  information security and  healthcare compliance. We’re headquartered in Freehold, NJ with a technology development data center and lab in Newark, NJ and a 24/7 NOC, call center, and R&D team. We provide technology solutions, healthcare services, cloud environments, and information security and healthcare compliance services to medium-sized and enterprise organizations. The role of a Chief Growth Revenue Officer (CGRO) in Exelegent is the leadership position responsible for driving sales growth, developing strategic partnerships, and leading the business development efforts. This role combines elements of sales, marketing, and business development to create and execute strategies that maximize revenue generation and enhance the company's market position. This position allows the candidate to progress to the next level position, Senior Sales and Development Manager, through significant performance and demonstrated strong leadership qualities.  Sales and Business Development Manager  Location: US, NJ Position: Full-time Starting date of the contract: As soon as possible  REQUIREMENTS: Education: Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, computer science, or a related field. Experience: Minimum 8-10 years of progressive experience in sales and business development, with a focus on the IT industry. Proven track record of consistently achieving or exceeding sales targets and driving business growth Industry Knowledge: Strong understanding of the IT industry, including software development, cloud computing, cybersecurity, and emerging technologies. In-depth knowledge of market trends, competitive landscape, and customer needs. Sales and Business Development Skills: Demonstrated success in developing and executing strategic sales plans, driving revenue growth, and expanding market presence. Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills. Strong relationship-building skills with clients, partners, and key stakeholders. Strategic Thinking and Business Acumen: deep understanding of sales, marketing, and business development strategies., problem-solving skills, ability to analyze complex business situations, identify growth opportunities, and make data-driven decisions. Analytical and Data-Driven Approach: strong analytical skills to interpret sales data, market trends, and customer insights, proficiency in utilizing CRM systems and sales analytics tools to drive sales effectiveness. Self-Motivation and Adaptability: proactive and self-driven with a strong work ethic, ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. RESPONSIBILITIES: Sales Strategy and Planning: develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve revenue targets, expand the customer base, and drive market penetration, identify market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape to formulate effective sales strategies and differentiate the company's offerings, set ambitious sales goals and objectives, monitor progress, and make adjustments as necessary. Business Development: identify and pursue new business opportunities, strategic partnerships, and alliances to drive business growth, generate leads, qualify prospects, and build a robust sales pipeline, conduct market research to identify potential clients, emerging technologies, and market trends, collaborate with marketing teams to develop targeted lead generation campaigns and go-to-market strategies. Sales Execution and Relationship Management: lead the end-to-end sales process, including lead generation, sales presentations, negotiations, and closing deals, build and maintain relationships with key clients, strategic partners, and industry influencers, ensure high levels of customer satisfaction and proactively address any issues or concerns, collaborate with the customer success team to drive client retention and upsell opportunities. Team Leadership and Management: lead and mentor a team of sales and business development professionals, providing guidance, coaching, and performance management, collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing, product development, and customer support, to align strategies and achieve business objectives. Strategic Partnerships and Alliances: identify and evaluate potential strategic partnerships, alliances, and distribution channels, build relationships with industry partners and explore collaborative opportunities to expand market reach and enhance product/service offerings, negotiate and establish partnership agreements, ensuring mutual benefits and long-term success. Sales Analytics and Reporting: analyze sales data, customer insights, and market trends to identify growth opportunities, challenges, and areas for improvement, develop and present accurate sales forecasts, reports, and performance metrics to senior management, drive the adoption of sales tools and technologies to enhance efficiency, data visibility, and sales productivity.  WE OFFER: Professional and friendly team Competitive salary Convenient offices location Paid Vacation, Sick Days, etc. Microsoft Certifications Comfortable workplace

Experience Level (if available): None
